body: i am using this app after 3 years.bt access of cash on delivery when i am using this option they are behave like unbeliveable person thank you swiggy i am unstalling thi app right now. very bad experiance.

title: Google Play Review
body: Pathetic Service by swiggy. I regret for subscribing swiggy one which is totally a scam to loot money from customers. 45 minutes after ordering my food I contacted customer care as delivery partner was not assigned for that particular order.Someone picked the call and disconnected saying your voice is breaking(the call was crystal clear and obviously the executive was lying).I called again and another rep said there is no one to pick my order.Shame on swiggy as it is happening on a regular basis

title: Google Play Review
body: Your order delivery time is taking too long...As compare to what is showing at the ordered time. Not good delivery services. ðŸ˜•

title: Google Play Review
body: I had ordered my food from swiggy.As the location was not there in their app so i had written it in the additional address The delivery man refused to come to the additional location and said rude things. Very bad experience. Nor did I get the food nor my money was refunded

title: Google Play Review
body: Very bad experience with swiggy, have ordered ice cream and I have never received the order nor the refund for not rendering the service. Worst customer support ever, they will just close your tickets without providing proper resolution I would like to rate it as 0 star

body: I request not to use swiggy app for food this farud app app still my amount not refunded if I call to coustomer service they use bad languages, everytime they deliver ur order late only coustomer care is worst support, please be aware of this type off apps

title: Google Play Review
body: If order any item mistakenly and if you want to cancel it. You have to pay 100% whole price of the item , What the heck is this. Just be careful. You do not know when you next order is going to become last order in swiggy

title: Google Play Review
body: App and delivery person are too good in swiggy, issue is with customer support, for more than a month, trying to get back my valid refund, but all swiggy executives do is give another time period to wait, that's how I have waited for 35+ days , still not able to get my money back, trying to resolve an issue with swiggy customer support is impossible, they just mentally harass the customer, so what is the benefit of being a member and a customer for so long...
